model.gameplay.strategy

Interface Strategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Aggressive, Benevolent, Cheater, ConcreteStrategy, Human, Random

    public interface Strategy
    The classes that implement a concrete strategy should implement this. The Player class uses this to use a concrete strategy.
    Author:
    Yann Kerichard, Yueshuai Jiang, Che-Shao Chen
